item.title: Walking the rightsizing walk, part 2: How I stopped hyperventilating
item.description: Now that my husband, DC, and I had sold the Happier Yellow House to the first buyer who saw it, we were quite suddenly, technically, homeless. Yeep! My head was literally spinning. I need to sit down often and put my head between my knees.

item.title: 10 best Sarasota sports bars for food, drinks, and game-day fun
item.description: It has been a long, hot summer in Sarasota —especially for the local restaurant and bar scene— but things are about to pick up with the return of football season.

item.title: A soul-renewing trip to Broadway filled with Tony-winning musicals
item.description: NEW YORK — I need occasional trips to New York and Broadway to renourish my soul the way some people thrive on whooshing down ski slopes, hiking in the woods or relaxing on a sandy beach. I love going to our Sarasota area theaters, but there’s an extra thrill being surrounded by the creativity on display in New York combined with the energy of the city itself.

item.title: Why LSU's defeat of Clemson might have saved the SEC's season
item.description: CLEMSON, S.C. — Weeks from now, while we’re deep into a crazy ride of acollege football season, we’ll look back and marvel at howLSUsaved the SEC season out of the gate.

item.title: Who are the Sarasota, Manatee cross country runners to…
item.description: A freshman from Riverview High earned the spotlight as the area’s most dominant cross country runner in 2024. Madison Muller was the area’s top finisher as runner-up at the FHSAA Class 4A State Cross Country Championships at Apalachee Regional Park in Tallahassee.

item.title: Top 5 concerts this week in Sarasota, Manatee counties
item.description: We say farewell toAugustand kick offSeptember's new lineup of local events this week, which will feature some interesting live music offerings. For instance, we have not one but two concerts featuring regional Mexican music stars taking place Saturday at area fairground arenas: Robarts Arena in Sarasota Fairgrounds and Mosaic Arena at Manatee County Fairgrounds in Palmetto.

item.title: Walking the rightsizing walk, part 3: 8 items to get rid…
item.description: I am so embarrassed. All these columns and books I have written on downsizing and decluttering and my oh my, the mess I am in. Moving is the ultimate truth test. As I pack up the house my husband, DC, and I have lived in for eight years, box towers line the halls, packed and stacked like big city skylines. Each room coughs up its contents like a kid with consumption. I fear I may never see a clear counter again.

item.title: Downtown Sarasota gym leaving Mira Mar for bigger spot near Sprouts
item.description: Jefferson Fit, a locally owned fitness and wellness center in downtown Sarasota, is moving to a new, bigger location with additional amenities.

item.title: Finally! Sarasota to honor local hero Dickey Betts of Allman Brothers
item.description: Dickey Betts’ nod to Highway 41 in the Allman Brothers Band anthem“Ramblin’ Man”is one of classic rock’s most recognizable lyrics — inspiring impromptu singalongs for more than half a century.

item.title: Developer Pat Neal approved to build south Sarasota County road
item.description: Sarasota County is proceeding with a plan to allow one of the area’smost powerful developersto build a road that will connect the fast-growing communities in south Sarasota County, where the development explosion in and around North Port has made it the county's largest city.
